cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses the task of text categorization, which is a subfield of Information Retrieval (IR) and Machine Learning (ML). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of KNN-based machine learning approach, which falls under the category of supervised learning, making cs.CL and cs.LG likely sub-categories as well. The paper also discusses the use of ML in text mining, which falls under the category of Natural Language Processing (NLP), making cs.AI a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions the use of deep learning, which falls under the category of Deep Learning (DL), making cs.DL a possible sub-category.
